CEEvent.Name: CE_random_event_random_villagers_raid
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultRandomEventsCommon1}Breaking down the door to a seemingly abandoned cottage, you're surprised to find a collection of villagers hiding inside, mainly women, children, and elders. They beg for your mercy, and you decide not to kill them on the spot - after all, they may turn out to be more valuable as prisoners than as corpses.

CEEvent.Name: CE_random_event_found_gold_raid
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultRandomEventsCommon3}Making your way through an unusually well-appointed cottage, your keen eyes discover a hatch hidden under an unusually-placed carpet. Your eyes glisten with deadly sin as you discover a hidden cache of gold inside. An auspicious start to what will doubtless be a very profitable day...

CEEvent.Name: CE_random_event_wine
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultRandomEventsCommon4}You notice a thin trail of flattened grass by the side of the road, and stepping off to investigate discover an unmarked barrel. It's a bit damaged, having apparently fallen off the back of a cart, but remains intact enough that when you pop the cork the smell of sweet wine floods your senses.

Option.OptionText: {=DefaultRandomEventsCommon5}Share it with the troops to boost morale.

CEEvent.Name: CE_random_event_dead
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultRandomEventsCommon6}You hear the sound of ravens ahead, cawing and fighting each other over something hidden just over the next ridge. As you approach, you realize the birds have made an extravagant feast out of some unfortunate soul's corpse. The body appears to be that of a warrior, still wearing damaged armor.

Option.OptionText: {=DefaultRandomEventsCommon_Dead2}Examine the body carefully for clues and valuables.

CEEvent.Name: CE_random_event_found_gold
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultRandomEventsCommon8}You find an odd sack by the side of the road; it looks as though it was abandoned recently, and upon opening it you discover a sum of gold inside. Fresh tracks lead away into the distance.

Option.OptionText: {=DefaultRandomEventsCommon_Gold3}Follow the tracks to find who dropped it.

CEEvent.Name: CE_random_event_lost_gold
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultRandomEventsCommon10}You reach for your money-pouch, only to find it missing from your belt. You don't recall where you saw it last - was it stolen or simply dropped?

CEEvent.Name: CE_random_event_spring
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultRandomEventsCommon12}You come upon an effervescent spring, smelling slightly of sulfur. Fanciful childhood tales of secret healing springs danced in your head.

CEEvent.Name: CE_random_event_spring_1
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultRandomEventsCommon15}You take a drink out of the spring. Maybe it was a bad idea as you feel nauseous.

CEEvent.Name: CE_random_event_spring_2
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultRandomEventsCommon17}You take a drink out of the spring. It feels refreshing.

CEEvent.Name: CE_random_event_spring_3
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultRandomEventsCommon_Spring3}Your medical knowledge allows you to identify the spring's healing properties. You carefully bottle some of the water and share it with those who need it most.

Option.OptionText: {=DefaultRandomEventsCommon_Spring4}Use the water to treat the wounded.

CEEvent.Name: CE_random_event_merchant_caravan
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultRandomEventsCommon_Merchant1}A well-guarded merchant caravan approaches on the road. The lead merchant waves cordially, offering to share the road and perhaps conduct some business.

CEEvent.Name: CE_random_event_injured_traveler
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultRandomEventsCommon_Injured1}You come upon a wounded traveler lying by the roadside. They've been attacked by bandits and are badly hurt. They plead for your help.

CEEvent.Name: CE_random_event_minstrel
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultRandomEventsCommon_Minstrel1}A cheerful minstrel with a lute joins your party's rest stop. They offer to perform songs and tales in exchange for a meal and some coin.

CEEvent.Name: CE_random_event_deserters
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultRandomEventsCommon_Deserter1}You encounter a small group of deserter soldiers. They're armed but look desperate, unsure whether to beg for mercy or fight their way past you.

Option.OptionText: {=DefaultRandomEventsCommon_Deserter4}Give them some gold and send them away.

CEEvent.Name: CE_random_event_pilgrims
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultRandomEventsCommon_Pilgrim1}A group of pilgrims traveling to a holy site shares the road with you. They seem peaceful and offer blessings to those who aid travelers.

CEEvent.Name: CE_random_event_ancient_ruins
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultRandomEventsCommon_Ruins1}You stumble upon ancient ruins hidden by overgrowth. Crumbling pillars and weathered stones hint at a civilization long forgotten. Something about this place feels significant.

CEEvent.Name: CE_random_event_wild_horses
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultRandomEventsCommon_Horses1}A magnificent herd of wild horses grazes in a nearby meadow. They're skittish but some appear strong enough to be valuable mounts if tamed.

Option.OptionText: {=DefaultRandomEventsCommon_Horses2}Expertly capture and tame the finest specimens.

CEEvent.Name: CE_random_event_herbs
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultRandomEventsCommon_Herbs1}You notice an area rich with medicinal herbs and rare plants. With proper knowledge, these could be valuable for treating wounds or selling to apothecaries.

CEEvent.Name: CE_random_event_battlefield
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultRandomEventsCommon_Battlefield1}You come across the aftermath of a recent battle. Broken weapons, scattered armor, and fallen soldiers litter the field. The fighting must have been fierce.

CEEvent.Name: CE_random_event_hidden_cache
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultRandomEventsCommon_Cache1}Your scouts discover what appears to be a hidden cache, possibly belonging to bandits or smugglers. It's concealed but not particularly well-protected.

Option.OptionText: {=DefaultRandomEventsCommon_Cache4}Rush in and grab what you can.

CEEvent.Name: CE_random_event_village_dispute
CEEvent.Text: {=SettlementEventVillage1}You come across two villagers in a heated argument over land boundaries. They look to you for judgment.

CEEvent.Name: CE_random_event_village_festival
CEEvent.Text: {=SettlementEventVillage2}The village is bustling with activity. It seems a local festival is taking place, with music, food, and dancing.

Option.OptionText: {=SettlementEventVillage2_Opt2}Buy a round of drinks for everyone.

CEEvent.Name: CE_random_event_tavern_brawl
CEEvent.Text: {=SettlementEventTavern1}A drunken argument escalates into a full-blown brawl near your table. Chairs are flying!

Option.OptionText: {=SettlementEventTavern1_Opt1}Join the fray and teach them a lesson!
{=SettlementEventTavern1_Opt3}Leave the tavern before things get worse.

CEEvent.Name: CE_random_event_high_stakes_gambler
CEEvent.Text: {=SettlementEventTavern2}A wealthy patron challenges you to a high-stakes game of dice. The pile of gold on the table is substantial.

CEEvent.Name: CE_random_event_training_yard
CEEvent.Text: {=SettlementEventCastle1}The garrison soldiers are drilling in the training yard. They seem to be practicing new formations.

CEEvent.Name: CE_random_event_minor_feast
CEEvent.Text: {=SettlementEventCastle2}The lord of the castle is hosting a minor feast for the local notables. You are invited to join.

CEEvent.Name: CE_random_event_street_beggar
CEEvent.Text: {=SettlementEventCity1}A street beggar approaches you, claiming to be a former soldier of fortune who fell on hard times.

Option.OptionText: {=SettlementEventCity1_Opt2}Try to recruit him as an informant.

CEEvent.Name: CE_random_event_market_opportunity
CEEvent.Text: {=SettlementEventCity2}While walking through the market, you notice a merchant selling goods at what seems to be a suspiciously low price.

Option.OptionText: {=SettlementEventCity2_Opt1}Buy and try to resell for profit.
